name: ServiceFabricPowerShell
description: Run a PowerShell script within the context of an Azure Service Fabric cluster connection.
author: Microsoft Corporation

inputs.name: serviceConnectionName
inputs.label: Cluster Connection
inputs.helpMarkDown: Azure Service Fabric cluster which will have an established connection when executing the specified PowerShell script.

inputs.name: ScriptType
inputs.label: Script Type
inputs.helpMarkDown:
Type of the script to be executed:

- Script File Path: the script to execute exists as a file.
- Inline Script: the script to execute is provided as text in the task.

inputs.name: ScriptPath
inputs.label: Script Path
inputs.helpMarkDown: Path of the script. Should be fully qualified path or relative to the default working directory.

inputs.name: Inline
inputs.label: Inline Script
inputs.defaultValue:
# You can write your PowerShell scripts inline here. 
# You can also pass predefined and custom variables to this script using arguments

inputs.name: ScriptArguments
inputs.label: Script Arguments
inputs.helpMarkDown: Additional parameters to pass to PowerShell.  Can be either ordinal or named parameters.

messages.InvalidScriptArguments0: Invalid script arguments '{0}'. Line breaks are not allowed.
messages.InvalidScriptPath0: Invalid script path '{0}'. Invalid path characters specified.
